courses.title: Level 1
courses.description: For those completely new to bachata. We go through basic steps, rhythm, and simple turns.

courses.title: Level 2
courses.description: We build upon the basics with more variation, musicality, and partnering.

courses.title: Level 3 Technique
courses.description: A technique course focusing on body control, leading, and connection.

courses.title: Level 3
courses.description: A technique course focusing on body control, leading, and connection.

courses.title: Level 4
courses.description: Advanced level with fluid movements, footwork, and combinations.
requirements: Danced for at least 2 years regularly

courses.title: Level 4 Technique
courses.description: In-depth study of technique, isolations, and musicality.
requirements: Danced for at least two years

courses.title: Level 5
courses.description: Our most advanced course for those who want to refine their style and performance.

courses.title: Role Rotation
courses.description: A course where you learn to both lead and follow. Break traditional patterns, gain a deeper understanding of the dance, and become a more complete and versatile dancer on the social floor.

courses.title: Advanced Basics
courses.description: This course focuses on body awareness, technique, and control to bring a new level of elegance and confidence to your style.

courses.title: Styling for Followers
courses.description: In this course for followers, we focus on arm styling, body movement, and footwork to give you the confidence to interpret the music and truly shine in your dance.
